review: This was for a friend who needed a Guitar Capo. He hasn't had any problem with the capo yet. And the price was right.
I bought this for a friend who plays the guitar. He said that you can hear the guitar but barely.
This was a gift for a friend who is a Beatles fan. I bought him two different types he he liked them both. These will not be used much.
This was a gift for a friend who is a fan of the Beatles. He was very happy with his gift.
This was for a friend who plays guitar. He used it several times and said that he was satisfied with the results.
this was for a friend who liked the way the guitar pikup worked that he ordered 2 more for his family members.
I couldn't say that I loved it. It's only a guitar hanger. It just holds a guitar. If I needed another I would buy this type.
this was a gift for a friend who is practicing to play the guitar. He has enjoy and likes using the capo.
The cradle guitar stand was for a friend. He was happy with the cradle guitar stand. Hasn't had any problems with it.
